channel.title: Re: Moparisthebest.com Rules (car discussion)
channel.description:
This discussion started in the rules topic:
LMFAOL dude. American cars suck. I mean my Lancer Evolution VIII can smoke a GT mustang or an SS camaro anyday. Shit, I can even smoke Corvettes. BTW, IMPORTS FTW. Mopar's a pretty good brand...That's if you own an SRT-4! Lol... Anyways, Just wanted to say, that was the gayest made up rule 440.

item.title: Re: Moparisthebest.com Rules (car discussion)
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:19, topic:8337”]Jeep ftl.


Bugatiis are sexy.

Sorry mopar ;D[/quote]

did you watch this on top gear? i sooo want this car

ristricted at 272mph or 252mph i cant remember and can go over 300
it has 2 engines in it and i think something like 11 radiators
only does a few mpg tho

on Top Gear they had a race from somewhere in spain i think it was

Jeremy Clarkson had the bucati
richard hammond and james may had a 1 prop plane =]

bucati won Just

oh and it aparently cost them £6m to make and they were selling for under £1m

they built it just to see if it could be done therefore only a couple in the world

Read full topic

Mopar, no you couldn’t!

You’d just have to put your banjo in a fire, and then it’ll go faster.

item.title: Re: Moparisthebest.com Rules (car discussion)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“VG_Kobra, post:53, topic:8337”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=13688.msg132351#msg132351 date=1154929810]

LMFAOL dude. American cars suck. I mean my Lancer Evolution VIII can smoke a GT mustang or an SS camaro anyday. Shit, I can even smoke Corvettes. BTW, IMPORTS FTW. Mopar’s a pretty good brand…That’s if you own an SRT-4! Lol… Anyways, Just wanted to say, that was the gayest made up rule 440.

SRT-4? rofl, obviously you dont know about the older cars, you think your craptastic chink-mobile could beat a 1969 Plymouth Roadrunner with a 426 hemi in it? don’t think so
[/quote]

McLaren owns any car you can name. Unless the same turds who put a Viper engine in a pickup end up putting a rocket in your clunkers.[/quote]

I could build an american muscle car to beat a mclaren easily, provide the money of course…

(note that it would cost well under 100k, whereas a mclaren costs 900k +)

Read full topic

item.title: Re: Moparisthebest.com Rules (car discussion)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“KeV, post:49, topic:8337”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=13688.msg169650#msg169650 date=1156057522]

How about this. An F1 car beats everything (pretty much).

A jet wins…
[/quote]

A jet is an aircraft, not a car.

It seams people from Europe are going to say that European cars are the best.
and Americans are going to say american cars are the best.

The Bugatti Veyron is the fastest car in the world, and by far the best. It travels over 230 mph, and hits 62 mph in 2.5 seconds, and I must admit, its the best looking car as well.[/quote]

I’m from the uk but this car is hawt.

[size=1pt]I’m also from Plymouth. :p[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Re: Moparisthebest.com Rules (car discussion)
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

[quote=“Stork, post:46, topic:8337”]You’re an idiot. It’s obvious that the entire car is plastic because the bumper doesn’t reflect like the roof.
Maybe, the bumper is made out of plastic?
Maybe, the bumper is painted in matt black instead of a shiny black?

Also, I’d like to see you ride around in an 800hp go-kart.[/quote]
You’re the idiot. The bumper is shiny. The part above it is dull. And if you’ll supply the engine, I’ll supply the frame for a 800hp go-kart and we’ll find out if it’s possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Re: Moparisthebest.com Rules (car discussion)
item.dc:creator: @Stork Stork
item.description:
@Stork wrote:

You’re an idiot. It’s obvious that the entire car is plastic because the bumper doesn’t reflect like the roof.

item.title: Re: Moparisthebest.com Rules (car discussion)
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

[quote=“Stork, post:44, topic:8337”][quote author=googlethis link=topic=13688.msg162962#msg162962 date=1155859136]
I’m not saying it’s weird that there is 2 sources of light, I’m saying it’s odd that the lighting is dull in one area and shiny in another. It makes it look like it is part plastic/rubber/other dull material.
[/quote]
WTF? The surface of the car isn’t flat, ergo the light distribution isn’t normal.[/quote]
let me say this a little clearer…CARS ARE SHINY BECAUSE THEY ARE METAL. METAL IS SHINY. CARS THAT AREN’T SHINY NEED BUFFED, ARE RUSTY OR THEY ARE PLASTIC TOYS. If, say, it is a 3D model of the car, then that means they hire retards to to their modelling, and the car still sucks. Point being, the car is a piece of junk and ought to be used for scrap metal and the engine should be put on a go-kart, mainly because the company sucks/hires semi-retarded people. My point is made, and I’m willing to debate you as much as you please on it.

Read full topic
